description:
AJ+ is a global news community for the connected generation. We highlight human struggles and achievements, empower impassioned voices, and challenge the status quo. 
 
It is more than just another news app. It's a community. Putting you at the heart of stories that impact your life.
 
Our content is broken down and presented in cards: 
 
Video Card: Bite-Size, Shareable and engaging. Video cards aim to empower you with relevant information that contextualizes the world around you. From 6second headlines videos, through to 3min explainers and up to 7min documentaries, videos designed for a generation on the move.

Debate Card: Who doesn’t love a good debate? We know most issues have different viewpoints. These cards allow you to vote on a certain issue, take a stand and advocate your position within the community.

Conversation Card: Tired of trolls? This is the space to dive deeper into issues. We know we don’t have all of the answers (even though we’d like to think we do). A conversation card connects you with a global community to engage and learn from each other.

Quiz Card: Think you know everything? Take a quiz and test your knowledge. Quiz cards introduce a new and fun way to explore stories. 

Art Card: Who doesn’t love sharing a good quote or compelling stat? Lucky for you, we love data! The art card is designed to highlight key data points around issues. They’re designed for you to share to your social networks.  

Resource Card: Let us Google that for you. We know people spend more time searching for additional info on stories. This card will make your life a bit easier with links to relevant stories, articles and bits of information.
 
Cards are organized in a collection we like to call stacks. Making it easy for you to dive deeper on topics that matter to you. Stacks never really disappear; they simply get refreshed as the stories rise to relevance.
 
EMPOWER. ENGAGE. EXPERIENCE.
releaseNotes:
- UPDATE: Fixed the activity feed crashes.

Recent updates:
- We squished some bugs and made the app faster.
- Use any photo from your camera for your AJ+ profile.
- Posting comments comes with a default no-crash option.
- Now you know what number you gave us. Phone number is in your settings.
- Home screen is way better. Smoother and no flickering. 
- No more invisible urls on email shares. We've returned the URL when you share through email.
